message.name: ERR_ISDEPCAREEXPEVIDENCE_FV_FREQUENCY
message.locale: Dependent care frequency must be entered.
Dependant care frequency must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ISDEPCAREEXPEVIDENCE_FV_AMOUNT
message.locale: Dependent care amount must be entered.
Dependant care amount must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ISDEPCAREEXPEVIDENCE_FV_AMOUNT_SMALL
message.locale: Dependent care amount must be greater than zero.
Dependant care amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_ISDEPCAREEXPEVIDENCE_XFV_HOUSEHOLD_MEMBER_DEPENDENT
message.locale: Household member and dependent must not be the same person.
Household member and dependant must not be the same person.
